name: df-lco
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(clinco, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), crab(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wrex(s3, co(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(s0))), cmap, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s3), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cfv(clinc, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ LinCo =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà P((Base ` s0))‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)| ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà((Base `(Scalar ` s0))[‚Ü¶]s1),(s3[finSupp](0 `(Scalar ` s0))‚àß s2 =(s3[(linC ` s0)]s1)))})
comment: Define the operation constructing the set of all linear combinations for a set of vectors. (Contributed by AV, 31-Mar-2019.) (Revised by AV, 28-Jul-2019.)
